Class Exporter

java.lang.Object
pt.up.fe.els2024.export.Exporter
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSVExporter, HTMLExporter, JSONExporter, XMLExporter
public class Exporter extends Object
The Exporter class provides base functionality for exporting Table data. It includes utilities for writing content to files and finding the maximum number of rows in a table, which is useful when formatting tabular data consistently across different file formats. This class is intended to be extended by format-specific exporters (e.g., CSVExporter).

  • Method Details

    • export

      public static void export() throws ExportException
      Placeholder method for export functionality. Throws an ExportException if called, as subclasses are expected to implement specific export logic.
      Throws:
      ExportException - indicating that the export method is not implemented

    • getMaxRows

      public static int getMaxRows(Table table)
      Calculates the maximum number of rows across all columns in the given Table.
      Parameters:
      table - the table from which to find the maximum row count
      Returns:
      the maximum row count among all columns in the table

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile(String content, String fileName) throws ExportException, IOException
      Writes the specified content to a file with the given file name.
      Parameters:
      content - the content to be written to the file
      fileName - the name (or path) of the file where the content will be written
      Throws:
      ExportException - if an export-specific error occurs
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during file writing
